title: Doggy Tricks

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record the dogs name and a command onto the switch e.g "Ozzy, sit!"
• Record new commands onto the switch for the switch user to say to the dog to keep it fun and motivating
• Reward the dog with treats to keep them engaged also!

tooltipText: Activate the switch to call your dog over or command them to do a trick (make sure they get a treat!)
